txt.en: 'He must! This is not speculation. This is a real threat!'
'Fare well, my friends! I am off to warn my fellow dwarves!'
'I came from Jazârgund not two mornings ago.'
'I make for the Orc-watch -- I expected to have a smooth journey!'
'All reports from the Twenty-first Hall had assured that this way was clear!'
'But it has been far from safe once I entered this hall.'
'That is Gazatu-ru! There are many Orcs within.'
'The foreman of the Twenty-first Hall has completely let his guard down, Dómárr.'
'It was terribly frustrating to argue with such an optimistic dwarf!'
'I must go back and warn Mögr!'
'Do you think he will listen to you this time?'
'Well, follow me, if you would like to see what is really happening in Zelem-melek.'
